agility.name: Agility
agility.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.

sleep-talk.name: Sleep Talk
sleep-talk.effect: Randomly uses one of the user’s other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

focus-blast.name: Focus Blast
focus-blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

plasma-fists.name: Plasma Fists
plasma-fists.effect: After inflicting damage, causes all Normal-type moves to become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn.

u-turn.name: U-turn
u-turn.effect: User must switch out after attacking.

close-combat.name: Close Combat
close-combat.effect: Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

blaze-kick.name: Blaze Kick
blaze-kick.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

thunderous-kick.name: Thunderous Kick
thunderous-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

throat-chop.name: Throat Chop
throat-chop.effect: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

night-daze.name: Night Daze
night-daze.effect: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

counter.name: Counter
counter.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

accelerock.name: Accelerock
accelerock.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

dark-pulse.name: Dark Pulse
dark-pulse.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

fire-blast.name: Fire Blast
fire-blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.effect: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

shadow-claw.name: Shadow Claw
shadow-claw.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

scary-face.name: Scary Face
scary-face.effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

steel-roller.name: Steel Roller
steel-roller.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

hammer-arm.name: Hammer Arm
hammer-arm.effect: Lowers user’s Speed by one stage.

head-smash.name: Head Smash
head-smash.effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

trick-room.name: Trick Room
trick-room.effect: For five turns, slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.

dream-eater.name: Dream Eater
dream-eater.effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

wring-out.name: Wring Out
wring-out.effect: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.effect: Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it’s asleep.

dragon-hammer.name: Dragon Hammer
dragon-hammer.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

grassy-glide.name: Grassy Glide
grassy-glide.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

poison-fang.name: Poison Fang
poison-fang.effect: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user’s max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

light-of-ruin.name: Light of Ruin
light-of-ruin.effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

power-whip.name: Power Whip
power-whip.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

mega-kick.name: Mega Kick
mega-kick.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

cosmic-power.name: Cosmic Power
cosmic-power.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

snipe-shot.name: Snipe Shot

octazooka.name: Octazooka
octazooka.effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

dynamic-punch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamic-punch.effect: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

soft-boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
soft-boiled.effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

dig.name: Dig
dig.effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

vacuum-wave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuum-wave.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

shell-smash.name: Shell Smash
shell-smash.effect: Raises user’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

head-charge.name: Head Charge
head-charge.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

lash-out.name: Lash Out
lash-out.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

high-jump-kick.name: High Jump Kick
high-jump-kick.effect: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

relic-song.name: Relic Song
relic-song.effect: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.

giga-impact.name: Giga Impact
giga-impact.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.effect: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.

focus-punch.name: Focus Punch
focus-punch.effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.effect: Scatters Spikes, hurting opposing Pokémon that switch in.

shore-up.name: Shore Up
shore-up.effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.

zap-cannon.name: Zap Cannon

spiky-shield.name: Spiky Shield

power-trip.name: Power Trip

weather-ball.effect: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.

strange-steam.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

solar-beam.name: Solar Beam
solar-beam.effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

future-sight.name: Future Sight

metal-burst.name: Metal Burst

flip-turn.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

meteor-assault.effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

spirit-break.name: Spirit Break

roar.name: Roar
roar.effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

block.name: Block

pyro-ball.name: Pyro Ball

meteor-beam.name: Meteor Beam

poltergeist.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
